revision.text: ====Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff==== When the furthest region reached is greater than 2 regions beyond a dungeons region, all loot below Weight 2 has its drop rate dramatically decreased. For example: if the furthest region reached by the player in the game is Alola, then all loot below weight 2 in Dungeons from before Unova, (i.e. Kanto-Sinnoh), would be affected by the debuff.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
